snippet.title: Planet Explorers - Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Arriving on Steam today, Planet Explorers is a unique sandbox adventure exploring the story of colonists on a faraway planet that allows players to build anywhere at any time to survive their environment. 

Developed by Pathea Games, the game is a hugely expansive MMORPG that allows freedom to players to roam the world around them, and survive however they see fit.

Twitter: https://twitter.com/PatheaGames
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/PatheaGames
Website: http://planetexplorers.pathea.net/
Steam: http://store.steampowered.com/app/237870/
